thread.title: Let It Shine results revealed: Jamie, Ryan, Anthony, Craig and Josh booted off by Gary Barlow
thread.title_full: Let It Shine results revealed: Jamie, Ryan, Anthony, Craig and Josh booted off by Gary Barlow

author: Nicola Agius
title: Let It Shine results revealed: Jamie, Ryan, Anthony, Craig and Josh booted off by Gary Barlow

organizations.name: nightfall, iron sun and five to five

text:
The Let It Shine results are in. 
Gary Barlow , Martin Kemp, Dannii Minogue and guest judge Ricki Lake decided the bottom two bands were Neon Pandas and Drive. 
And out of the two groups, Jamie, Ryan, Anthony, Craig and Josh were chosen to get the boot. 
Explaining the judges' decision, Gary said: "It's impossible at this stage because any of the [remaining] bands could be in our band. 
"I know you will be disappointed but I'm just hoping you all learnt something while you were here. Good luck everyone." (Photo: ITV) 
The judges' decision of course means that Jazzy, Johnny, Mark, Connor and Matt have all managed to keep their places in the competition. Read More 
However, because the former three are all members of Drive, the latter two were told that they are no longer part of Neon Pandas and ordered to join the other band. (Photo: ITV) 
Connor seemed pretty upset to turn his back on the group he has been rehearsing with for so long. 
But head judge Gary wasn't too empathetic. 
"You need to pick yourself up right now," he said. "This is showbiz - especially theatre! Everything gets turned on its head. Someone could get ill or someone could get sick. (Photo: ITV) 
"Come back fighting next week!" 
The new and improved Drive will be competing in the semi final next week against Nightfall, Iron Sun and Five to Five, 
*Let It Shine returns to BBC One on Saturday at 6.55pm Like us on Facebook
